snippet: The new offensive aims to break rebel control of a highway between two major cities, according to Syrian state media and antigovernment activists.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Beirut, and Ivan Nechepurenko from Moscow.

abstract: Forces loyal to Syrian president Bashar al-Assad, supported by Russian airstrikes, attack rebel positions; witnesses report bombardment was heaviest in months; regime also continues to receive backing from Iran.
lead_paragraph: The new offensive aims to break rebel control of a highway between two major cities, according to Syrian state media and antigovernment activists.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Government Forces, Backed by Russian Jets, Strike at Rebel-Held Towns
headline.main: Syrian Government Forces, Backed by Russian Jets, Strike at Rebel-Held Towns
